nodes.text: The Garden Hall was a hall in the Killik hive Saras on the planet Woteba, built to receive outsiders to the hive.

It was here that UnuThul met with Han Solo, Leia Organa Solo, Saba Sebatyne, Mara Jade Skywalker, and Luke Skywalker in 36 ABY. At the time, the hall was being overtaken by the Fizz, rendering it useless.
